Getting Started with UPLim

UPLim is a simple, cross-platform programming language designed for humans.

Installation

To install the UPLim CLI, use npm:

npm install -g uplim-lang

Your First Program

Create a file named hello.upl:

say "Hello, World!"

Run it:

uplim run hello.upl
